title: I've been playing since season 1, invested alot into this game... and I'm being banned??
body: I've been playing league since season 1, and been quite a loyal player.  I've always been a positive player and I've invested hundred of dollars into this game.  Now apparently I can't play for 14 days??  Because I "fed intentionally" for 1 game?  We all have bad games.  I played new the malzahar for my first time in normals and got camped. I realize now I'm bad at this new version of the champion, but seriously riot.  Please remove this 14 day ban as it is very bizarre and uncalled for.  I'd hate to be turned off this game because of this situation, and hope you can swiftly rectify it.  If not, please refund my the money I've invested because I'm not satisfied with your product Riot.  Ban people who repeatedly troll, not someone who's been playing since season 1 and has one bad game.  Thank you very much.

replies.body: It doesn't matter how much time or money you've spent on the game, you cannot buy special exemptions from the rules; if you are ruining the game for others, Riot does not want you. You will not be refunded because the content you paid for was already delivered and you attached it to an account that Riot owns (read the ToS). This is only a 14 day, so you can pout, or you can suck it up and take responsibility and reform so you don't lose the account permanently.

What I'm saying is that I'm not in need of reformation.  I've been playing this game since season 1 without any bans.  Something must be wrong with the system for banning me 14 days after I have one rough game..  I realize I cannot buy exemptions from the rules.. I'm just reminding Riot that I've supported them for 6 years now, and the least they could do is support me a bit.

No, there is nothing wrong with the system. Intentionally ruining the game for others is absolutely not allowed, and you did it in such an obvious way that of course you'd be caught. If you don't have any need to reform because this is the only time you'll do it, then you have nothing to worry about and you won't get permabanned.

You can't go out and shoot someone and say "Hey, I only did it once, it was a bad day". You'll still have to pay for the crime.

Would you mind sharing a picture of your build path from that last match?

I'm not sure how to do that..  is there a way to show u my build path? a site maybe?  
I had a bad game, we all have bad games.  But I'm never toxic and don't feed intentionally.  This is all just very frustrating for me to have to explain but I hope I riot will remove this unjust suspension.
If you don't mind me linking it, it looks like the match was recorded on replays.gg.
cool! for sure

I mean, I can see why people would think that you're right.  Good point.  So you can either believe me or not, I guess I don't care.  I'm just frustrated that after 6 seasons I'm getting a suspension.  I'm not a toxic or feeding player.  I was just trying out a new champ and got camped by a high level rengar and yasuo.

What if you had an ally who went 1/15/0 and then you push tab you see he only has tears?  Wouldn't you report him?  I understand the frustration but honestly you did it to yourself.  Don't take a bad situation and make it worse.

In the last 15 or so mins in the game, you died 12 times. That's almost once per minute. That's seriously barely enough time to spawn and get to the lane. I'm sorry to say, but being a plat ranked player playing against players lower level than you, I find it very hard to believe it was unintentional. 

Obviously don't have the game footage to make a determination, but a death per minute is generally trolling in my book, ESPECIALLY from a plat player. I just can't believe that a plat level player wouldn't understand the concept of playing safe when behind. Playing safe isn't dying literally once per minute. Nobody else on your team had that issue. 

Also, it's highly unlikely that you got punished for the Malz game that ended a couple hours ago. Bans generally aren't that quick, unless it's in response to racism, etc., where the automated system can get you. It's for more likely that you got punished for the 0/19/4 Ryze game a couple days ago.
It told me i was punished for this one.  as i said. first time malz.

Also, it doesn't matter that it was a first time champ. You might not know his abilities, but as a plat player, you should know that continually running into the enemy to die is wrong. Period. No sympathy from me Mr.

You see it as "just one game". But what you don't realize is that your "just one game" is also someone's ONLY game that they played that day, or multiple days, during a study break.
